item.title: 随着 "最佳 "报价截止日期的到来，更高的金属关税开始生效
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）加大全球贸易战的力度，美国对大部分进口钢铁和铝的关税税率将在周三翻倍，他希望贸易伙伴在同一天提出他们的最佳报价，以避免对其他商品的惩罚性进口税率在七月初生效。【原文：The U.S. tariff rate on most imported steel and aluminum will double on Wednesday as President Donald Trump ratchets up a global trade war on the same day he expects trading partners to deliver their best offer in bids to avoid punishing import tax rates on other goods from taking effect in early July.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，美国数万用户的 Roblox 出现故障
item.description: 根据故障跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 的数据，视频游戏制造商 Roblox 周二在美国有数万名用户遭遇故障。【原文：Video game maker Roblox was down for tens of thousands of users in the United States on Tuesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 风能反对者起诉特朗普政府阻止纽约风能项目
item.description: 周二，渔业公司和海上风电反对者提起诉讼，质疑特朗普政府决定扭转方向，允许恢复帝国风电公司（Empire Wind）的建设，该公司是纽约沿海一个耗资 50 亿美元的风电场项目。【原文：Fishing companies and offshore wind opponents filed a lawsuit on Tuesday challenging the Trump administration's decision to reverse course and allow construction to resume on Empire Wind, a $5 billion wind farm project off New York's coast.】

item.title: 查理-沙尔夫如何让富国银行走出禁区
item.description: 查理-沙尔夫（Charlie Scharf）近六年前接任富国银行首席执行官时，曾说过富国银行的文化已经支离破碎。本周二，美联储在取消 2018 年实施的 1.95 万亿美元资产上限时表示，该银行的问题已基本解决。【原文：When Charlie Scharf took over as Wells Fargo CEO nearly six years ago, he said its culture was broken. On Tuesday, the Fed said the bank's problems were mostly fixed as it lifted a $1.95 trillion asset cap imposed in 2018.】

item.title: 新版 AutoMotive 早期数据显示，特斯拉 5 月在英国的汽车销量下降超过 45
item.description: 研究机构 New AutoMotive 周三提供的初步数据显示，特斯拉 5 月份在英国的新车销量同比下滑超过 45%。【原文：Tesla's new car sales in Britain tumbled more than 45% from a year earlier in May, preliminary data from research group New AutoMotive showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 西太平洋银行与澳大利亚证券监管机构就行为监督调查达成和解
item.description: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行（Westpac）周三表示，其旗下的 RAMS 金融集团已与该国证券监管机构达成一项协议，以解决对其特许经营商及其员工行为监督问题的调查。【原文：Australia's Westpac said on Wednesday that its unit, RAMS Financial Group, had reached an agreement with the country's securities regulator to resolve an investigation concerning oversight of conduct of its franchisees and their employees.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司股东否决 2024 年高管薪酬
item.description: 周二的一份监管文件显示，在华纳兄弟发现公司的年度股东大会上，大多数股东投票反对首席执行官大卫-扎斯拉夫（David Zaslav）和其他高管 2024 年的薪酬方案。【原文：A majority of Warner Bros Discovery shareholders voted against the 2024 pay packages of CEO David Zaslav and other top executives at the media conglomerate's annual stockholder meeting, a Tuesday regulatory filing showed.】

item.title: 条款表显示，维珍澳大利亚寻求在首次公开募股中融资 4.428 亿美元
item.description: 据路透社周三看到的一份条款书显示，贝恩资本控股的维珍澳大利亚公司正寻求通过首次公开募股融资 6.85 亿澳元（4.4278 亿美元）。【原文：Bain Capital-owned Virgin Australia is looking to raise A$685 million ($442.78 million) in an initial public offering, according to a term sheet seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所 Arca 提交 Truth Social 比特币 ETF 上市申请
item.description: 纽约证券交易所 Arca 周二向美国市场监管机构提交了一份文件，寻求监管机构批准 Truth Social 比特币 ETF 上市。【原文：NYSE Arca on Tuesday submitted a filing to the U.S. markets regulator seeking regulatory approval to list the Truth Social Bitcoin ETF.】

item.title: 即时观点富国银行资产上限被取消，银行得以增长
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）周二晚些时候宣布，富国银行将不必再按照监管机构在其长期销售行为丑闻后于 2018 年对该银行施加的 1.95 万亿美元资产上限运营。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve announced late on Tuesday that Wells Fargo will no longer have to operate under a $1.95 trillion asset cap the regulator imposed on the bank in 2018 following its long-running sales practices scandal.】

item.title: 美国从英国进口的钢铁和铝将保持在 25% 的水平上
item.description: 根据美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二签署的一份公告，美国从英国进口钢铁和铝的关税将保持在25%，而从其他来源进口的关税将在6月4日提高到50%。【原文：Tariffs on United States' imports of steel and aluminum from the United Kingdom will remain at 25% when imports from other sources will increase to 50% on June 4, according to a proclamation U.S. President Donald Trump signed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易日：市场拐点层出不穷
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 贝莱德退出气候组织，从得克萨斯州抵制名单中除名
item.description: 德克萨斯州周二将贝莱德从被视为抵制能源行业的公司名单中除名，这家纽约资产管理公司是在大幅削减其气候雄心的情况下才赢得这一步骤的。【原文：Texas on Tuesday removed BlackRock from a list of companies seen as boycotting the energy industry, a step the New York asset manager won only with steep cuts to its climate ambitions.】

item.title: 关税前热潮褪去，美国 5 月汽车销售率大幅下滑
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统对进口汽车征收关税，汽车消费者在前两个月纷纷抢购，以应对预期的价格上涨，5月份美国轻型汽车销量创下约五年来的最大降幅。【原文：The U.S. light vehicle sales rate slumped in May by the most in about five years following a rush by auto shoppers during the previous two months to beat anticipated price hikes stoked by President Donald Trump's tariffs on imported automobiles.】

item.title: 航空公司必须就更环保的燃料签订长期协议，以提高运输量：拜耳执行官
item.description: 拜耳公司的一位高管周二表示，如果航空公司想在全球范围内增加行业气候目标所需的低排放燃料的用量，就需要达成长期协议，购买更多的可持续航空燃料。【原文：Airlines need to reach long-term agreements to buy bigger quantities of sustainable aviation fuel if they want to boost global volumes of the lower-emission fuel required for industry climate targets, a Bayer executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储取消富国银行资产上限，理由是销售丑闻取得进展
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）周二宣布，富国银行（Wells Fargo）在经历了长期的销售行为丑闻后，将不必再按照监管机构于 2018 年对该银行施加的 1.95 万亿美元资产上限进行运营。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve announced on Tuesday that Wells Fargo will no longer have to operate under a $1.95 trillion asset cap the regulator imposed on the bank in 2018 following its long-running sales practices scandal.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 预测第二季度收入低于预期
item.description: CrowdStrike 预测第二季度营收低于预期，表明企业在网络安全产品上的支出疲软，导致该公司股价在周二盘后交易中下跌 6.7%。【原文：CrowdStrike forecast second-quarter revenue below estimates, signaling soft enterprise spending on cybersecurity products, sending the company's shares down 6.7% in after-hours trading on Tuesday.】

item.title: 富国银行解除 1.95 万亿美元资产上限的漫长之路
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）周二宣布，富国银行（Wells Fargo）在经历了长期的销售行为丑闻后，将不必再按照监管机构于 2018 年对该银行施加的 1.95 万亿美元资产上限进行运营。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve announced on Tuesday that Wells Fargo will no longer have to operate under a $1.95 trillion asset cap the regulator imposed on the bank in 2018 following its long-running sales practices scandal.】

item.title: 惠普企业公司季度收入超出预期
item.description: 惠普企业公司周二公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期，并称该季度计提了 13.6 亿美元的减值费用。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise beat Wall Street revenue estimates for the second quarter on Tuesday and said it recorded an impairment charge of $1.36 billion in the quarter.】

item.title: 特朗普有望放弃《国防生产法》要求，以促进关键矿产和武器的发展
item.description: 据路透社看到的一份文件显示，唐纳德-特朗普预计将放弃国防生产的法定要求，包括国会对大型项目的批准，以帮助提高国内关键矿物和武器的生产。【原文：Donald Trump is expected to waive statutory requirements under the Defense Production, including congressional approval for larger projects, to help boost domestic production of critical minerals and weapons, according to a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 中国拒绝荷兰部长的间谍指控，称技术成果并非 "窃取 "而来
item.description: 荷兰国防部长指责中国政府加强间谍活动，特别是在半导体领域，而中国周二否认其科技成就是由于 "窃取 "了知识产权。【原文：China denied on Tuesday that its scientific and technological achievements were due to "stolen" intellectual property, after comments by the Dutch defence minister accusing Beijing of intensifying its espionage, especially on semiconductors.】

item.title: 随着愤怒情绪的增长，古巴部分收回了上调的互联网费率
item.description: 古巴表示，将开始以大幅降价的方式为学生提供额外的移动互联网数据计划，而在此之前，最初的费率上调已在这个因通货膨胀飙升和基本商品短缺而陷入困境的岛国引起了众怒。【原文：Cuba said it would begin to offer additional mobile internet data plans at a sharply reduced price for students after an initial rate hike prompted outrage across an island already reeling from soaring inflation and shortages of basic goods.】

item.title: 文件显示，欧盟反垄断监管机构对威士卡和万事达卡的调查升级
item.description: 据路透社看到的文件显示，欧盟反垄断监管机构正在询问零售商和支付公司，威士卡和万事达卡的标准化费用汇总以及提高收费透明度是否能解决他们的担忧。【原文：EU antitrust regulators are asking retailers and payments companies whether a standardized summary of fees by Visa and Mastercard and more transparency on the charges would address their concerns, according to documents seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国航空公司希望联邦航空局推迟飞行甲板二级屏障要求
item.description: 本周二，美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）表示，要求新客机在飞行甲板上设置第二道屏障以防止入侵的规定将于 8 月份生效，各大航空公司希望联邦航空管理局推迟该规定的实施时间。【原文：Major airlines want the Federal Aviation Administration to delay a requirement set to take effect in August requiring that new passenger airplanes have a secondary barrier to the flight deck to prevent intrusions, the agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 韩国新领导人将为美国贸易谈判争取更多时间
item.description: 据熟悉韩国执政党想法的消息人士透露，韩国新政府可能会努力为美国贸易谈判争取时间，同时研究较大的邻国日本和中国的谈判情况，以寻找筹码。【原文：The new South Korean administration will likely make efforts to buy time for U.S. trade talks, as it studies the negotiations of bigger neighbours Japan and China for leverage, according to sources familiar with the ruling party's thinking.】

item.title: 全球数以千计的用户无法使用 Reddit
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，社交媒体平台 Reddit 周二有超过 2.6 万名用户宕机。【原文：Social media platform Reddit was down for over 26,000 users on Tuesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 马斯克称特朗普的减税和支出法案 "令人厌恶憎恨
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二加大了对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统一直在推动国会共和党同僚支持的全面税收和支出法案的批评力度，称其为 "令人作呕的憎恶"，将增加财政赤字。【原文：Elon Musk on Tuesday amplified his criticism of the sweeping tax and spending bill that President Donald Trump has been pushing fellow Republicans in Congress to embrace, calling it a "disgusting abomination" that will increase the deficit.】

item.title: 摩根大通资深员工安迪-奥布莱恩在华尔街巨头任职 40 年后退休
item.description: 根据路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通贷款资本战略全球主管安迪-奥布莱恩（Andy O'Brien）将于 2025 年底退休，他在这家美国最大的贷款机构工作了 40 年。【原文：Andy O'Brien, the global head of loan capital strategy at JPMorgan Chase , is set to retire at the end of 2025 after 40 years at the largest U.S. lender, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 白宫：美国本周寻求各国提出最佳贸易提议
item.description: 白宫发言人卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）周二表示，美国已要求各国在周三之前就贸易谈判提出最佳方案，因为美国官员正在加紧努力，争取在唐纳德-特朗普总统自我设定的仅剩五周的最后期限之前向其提交多项协议。【原文：The U.S. has asked countries to make their best offers on trade negotiations by Wednesday, White House spokeswoman Karoline Leavitt said on Tuesday, as U.S. officials ramp up efforts to deliver multiple agreements to President Donald Trump before a self-imposed deadline just five weeks away.】

item.title: 贝塔技术公司首次实现全电动飞机着陆
item.description: 贝塔技术公司（Beta Technologies）和港务局周二表示，该公司成为首家在纽约-新泽西地区机场降落全电动飞机的美国公司。【原文：Beta Technologies became the first U.S. company to land an all-electric aircraft at an airport in the New York-New Jersey region, the company and port authorities said in Tuesday.】
